en.content: The fading light from a narrow window tells you afternoon is giving way to evening. Your hands are shackled behind your back so you cannot even lie down on the rough bed. A woman you have not seen before comes in. Her face is wrinkled and her eyes dull. They do not meet yours, but she puts a cup to your lips.

zh.content: 窄窗透进的光逐渐变暗，你明白下午已经过去，夜晚即将到来。你的手被反绑在背后，甚至无法在粗糙的床上躺下。一个陌生女人走进来。她脸上满是皱纹，眼睛空洞无神。她并没有把视线朝向你，只是端出一个杯子碰到你嘴边。
